item.title: Hauling Corn and Checking Weights
item.description: Join us as we haul corn from the field and check weights, demonstrating proper handling, measurement, and tips for an efficient harvest process.

item.description: See the impact of the big storm as we assess damage, cleanup, and recovery, highlighting the challenges and resilience in the wake of severe weather.

item.description: We share our insights comparing Deere and Case 4-track tractors, covering performance, handling, and features to help farmers make informed equipment choices.

item.title: The 2096 Tractor Frozen to the Ground
item.description: Watch as we deal with a 2096 tractor stuck in frozen ground, showing the challenges and techniques used to free it and keep farm operations moving.
